hiveArticle.title: Costly Dental Clinic
hiveArticle.body:
In India it's very unusual, mostly as far as I know, that you charge too much for your dental problems or I might not know the reality. But whatever I came to my senses or say that I came to know that your dental problems can be costly.

So, I was suffering from bleeding gums. It was not happening regularly but whenever my brush completes the 2 months mark, my gums bleed. I always try to change my brush every 3 months. Bleeding gums being a common problem happens for a lot of reason.

So to know the reason and the remedy I visited the dental hospital. The clinic was really great means the interior. I was actually amazed to see the interiors as well as how well maintained it was.

![61yk79svw8.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/61yk79svw8.jpg)

<hr />

![vem9s354yg.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/vem9s354yg.jpg)

The doctor suggested me to with gum therapy and that will cost me around $150/ Rs 10000. So that was costly for me, I thought it would be something around 30$ / Rs 2000 but I was wrong, bangalore is really costly. So I dropped the plan to get for gum therapy in Bangalore, and will go for the therapy in Kolkata which is somewhat less costlier than Bangalore.
